meanings.definition: A flat bone of the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the blad in the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: She felt pain in her blad after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The blad decided to take a break from supporting the body.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as a blad in the body.
meanings.sent5: The blad, like a sturdy pillar, held everything together.

meanings.definition: A leaf of grass or cereal.
meanings.sent1: The cows grazed on the blad in the field.
meanings.sent2: She picked a fresh blad to press in her book.
meanings.sent3: The blad waved happily in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The blad danced gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The blad shimmered with dew in the morning light.
